column5: So I was up at BPS yesterday and saw that the Abu Garcia 5500 D5 was on clearance for $59 and change. I figured what the heck, it's too good a deal, the same reel was $129 a little while back, so, I picked one up. I figure it should be good for bass, pike, bottom bouncing for wally's and when I'm tired of fishing for bait, the odd Kawartha muskie. It seems like a decent reel that will work good with my spare bass casting rod. I'm gonna spool'er up with 50lb PP and go have some fun this summer. There's also some great deals on bass casting reels, there's a $200 Johnny Morris bass reel that's on for $79 and the Citica is also on special as well for I think $119.
Oh Thank you. Will check it out today! ASAP.
The Citica for $119 WOW! they usually go for $149 bucks i picked one up a couple of months ago, that is a drop in price i wonder why? How long is the sell on for?
Oh Darn...  Abu Garcia 5600 D5 is only right hand crank.
thanks! I will pick one up for my wife
